cleaned_text: January 02, 2021 Spiritual Cleansing for the New Year Spiritual cleansing, transforming the subtle energies of a room. Mix 1 Tablespoon of salt with 2 drops of Frankincense essential oil. Leave this mixture to dry. Open a window or door leading to the outside, which allows circulation of air, then sprinkle a tiny amount of the mixture around the room, including the corners, gradually moving toward the open window or door. From the book The Fragrant Heavens by Valerie
